append.summary: Any amount of objects can be provided as arguments, all of them will be converted to strings. Adds provided strings to end of this string. Returns this string

format.summary: Replaces each {} in this string with one of provided objects converted to string using object's toString method.

toUpperCase.summary: Makes all charecters of this string be UPPER CASE.

toLowerCase.summary: Makes all charecters of this string be lower case.

charAt.summary: Returns string that contains character at provided place
charAt.text: For example for string `StoryAnvil`, `charAt(^2)` will return `o`

substring.summary: Returns string that starts with provided character inclusive and ends with second provided character exclusive. Second argument is optional
substring.text: For example for string `StoryAnvil`, `substring(^2, ^7)` will return `oryAn`, and for string `StoryAnvil`, `substring(^2)` will return `oryAnvil`

replace.summary: Both arguments are converted to string using their toString methods. All occurences of `from` string will be replaced with `to` string
replace.text: For example for string `StoryAnvil`, `replace("ry", "ly")` will return `StolyAnvil`
